realizeInterest(address).details: Left permissionless so arbitrageurs can move fees to auction

claimableInterest(address).notice: Interest from a fractional reserve vault

divestAll(address).notice: Divest all of an asset from a fractional reserve vault and send any profit to fee auction

fractionalReserveVault(address).notice: Fractional reserve vault address for an asset

investAll(address).notice: Invest unborrowed capital in a fractional reserve vault (up to the reserve)

realizeInterest(address).notice: Realize interest from a fractional reserve vault and send to the fee auction

setFractionalReserveVault(address,addres.notice: Set the fractional reserve vault for an asset, divesting the old vault entirely

setReserve(address,uint256).notice: Set the reserve level for an asset
